name: Chiroform CAT Instrument
descr:
The Chiroform CAT may look and feel like other thrust adjustment devices, but it is designed for greater reliability and durability. As and added bonus, the CAT is still the most affordable thrust adjustment device available. The Chiroform CAT features padded contact points to reduce impact to your hand and arm when performing adjustments. The Chiroform CAT has a soft tip that is easily replaced to keep your instrument looking new for all your patients. The Chiroform CAT is compatible with established, published protocols for spine and extremity adjusting.

Optional: Cervical Tip
